text: Plagiochila wolframii is a species of plant in the Plagiochilaceae family. It is endemic to Peru. Its natural habitat is subtropical or tropical moist lowland forests. It is threatened by habitat loss. ==Sources== * Bryophyte Specialist Group 2000. Plagiochila wolframii. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 23 August 2007. Category:Jungermanniales Category:Flora of Peru Category:Critically endangered plants Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Plagiochila wolframii
